headline: Iron Mountain (NYSE:IRM) Appoints New Data Center EVP As Share Price Dips 9%
summary: Iron Mountain (NYSE:IRM) recently appointed Gary Aitkenhead as Executive Vice President and General Manager of Data Centers, a move that bolsters its leadership team amid broader market turmoil. Despite this executive change, the company's shares saw an 8% decline in the past month, likely influenced by the overall downturn in market sentiment due to ongoing tariff uncertainties. As markets, including the Dow and S&P 500, faced significant pressures with declines of 2% and 1.8% respectively,...

headline: Iron Mountain Appoints Gary Aitkenhead as Executive Vice President and General Manager, Data Centers
summary: PORTSMOUTH, N.H., April 07, 2025--Iron Mountain appoints Gary Aitkenhead as Executive Vice President and General Manager, Data Centers.
